name: Sabyasachi Karati
content: Sabyasachi Karati | Home Positions October 2020 - Present: Assistant Professor, Cryptology and Security Research Unit (C.S.R.U), R. C. Bose Centre for Cryptology and Security, Indian Statistical Institute (ISI) Kolkata, India. February 2019 - October 2020: Assistant Professor, School of Computer Sciences, National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER), Bhubaneswar, Odisha, India. 2016 - 2018: Post-Doctoral Fellow, Supervisor: Prof. Rei. Safavi-Nain, Computer Science (CPSC), University of Calgary (UofC), Calgary, Canada. 2015 - 2016: Post-Doctoral Fellow, Supervisor: Prof. Palash Sarkar, Applied Statistics Unit (ASU), Indian Statistical Institute (ISI), Kolkata, India. Education 2010 - 2015: PhD from the department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur, India. 2008 - 2010: M.Tech. from the department of Computer Science and Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur, India. 2004 - 2008: B.E. from the department of Computer Science and Engineering, Jadavpur University, Kolkata, India. 2004: West Bengal Council of Higher Secondary Education, Howrah Zilla School, Howrah, West Bengal, India. 2002: West Bengal Board of Secondary Education, Howrah Zilla School, Howrah, West Bengal, India. Primary Research Interest Public- Key Cryptography, Number theory, Computational Number Theory, Algorithm Design, Analysis, and efficient implementation.
